bibl.title: Peter Nelson et al v. Lewis V Wycoff. Civil
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

person.persName: Nelson Peter, Smith W, Elsner H, Whaley C, Mattson G, Lundblad Charles, Coffrey Dennis & Annir Jacob

div1.p: To S E Gray Master of the Bark Bern of the Osean

You are hereby summoned to appear before me JR Lewis Judge of the District Court of the 3d Judicial Distrist of said Territory held at Seattle in and for the countries of King Kitsap and Snohomish at my chambers in the City of Seattle and said County of King on the 3d day of May AD 1875, at the hour of 1 oclosk PM to show cause if any you have, why admiralty prosess should not issue out of the District Court aforesaid, against the above named Bark whereof you are Master , her tasker and formation to answer the demands of Peter Nelson W Smith H Elsner C Whaly G Mattson Charles Lunblad Dennis Coffy and Jacob Annir
late mariners on board said Bark for their wages as sush mariners earned on the voyage from the Port of San Fransisso to the Port of Seattle between the 8th day of April and the day of May AD 1875.
Given under my hand this 3 day of May AD 1875
Served the above summon on the above named Gray G reading the same to him and by delivering to him a true & correct copy of the same at Seattle in Dis Court WT
